<script> 
  
var sProtocol = (location.protocol == "http:") ? "http" : "https";
var awPixel = new Image(0, 0);
awPixel.src = sProtocol + "://www.awin1.com/sread.img?tt=ns&tv=2&merchant=21215&amount=" + '{{DLV - Purchase - transactionNetNoShipping}}' + 
  "&ch=" + 'aw' + 
  "&parts=" + '{{DLV - AWIN - Transaction Parts}}' + 
  "&ref=" + '{{DLV - Epsilon Transaction Items}}' + "&vc=" + '{{DLV - Purchase - Coupon}}' + "&cr=" + '{{DLV - Currency Code}}' + 
  "&testmode=0";
  
</script>

<!-- Javascript Tracking - Mandatory -->  
<script type="text/javascript">
 //<![CDATA[
    /*** Do not change ***/
    var AWIN = {};
    AWIN.Tracking = {};
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale = {};
   
    /*** Set your transaction parameters ***/
 	   
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale.amount = '{{DLV - Purchase - transactionNetNoShipping}}';
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale.currency = '{{DLV - Currency Code}}';
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale.orderRef = '{{DLV - Purchase - Transaction ID}}';
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale.parts = '{{DLV - AWIN - Transaction Parts}}';
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale.voucher = '{{DLV - Purchase - Coupon}}';
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale.test = '0';
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale.channel = 'aw';

	
	
   var transactionProducts = dataLayer[0].transactionProducts;
    AWIN.Tracking.Sale.plt = '';
    for (i = 0; i < transactionProducts.length; i++) {
            AWIN.Tracking.Sale.plt += "AW:P|21215|{{DLV - Purchase - Transaction ID}}|" + 
                              transactionProducts[i]['id'] + "|" + 
                              transactionProducts[i]['name'] + "|" + 
                              transactionProducts[i]['pricenet'] + "|" + 
                              transactionProducts[i]['quantity'] + "|" + 
                              transactionProducts[i]['sku'] + "|" + 
              		      transactionProducts[i]['cgCode'] + "|" + 
                              transactionProducts[i]['category'] + "\n";
    }    
    var basketForm = document.createElement('form');
    basketForm.setAttribute('style', 'display:none;');
    basketForm.setAttribute('name', 'basket_form');
    var basketTextArea = document.createElement('textarea');
    basketTextArea.setAttribute('wrap', 'physical');
    basketTextArea.setAttribute('id', 'aw_basket');
    basketTextArea.value = AWIN.Tracking.Sale.plt;
    basketForm.appendChild(basketTextArea);
    document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(basketForm);
    

 //]]>
</script>

<script>
(function (w, d, s) {
  if (w._dixa_) return;

  // Stub to queue API and listeners
  w._dixa_ = {
    invoke: function (m, a) {
      w._dixa_.pendingCalls = w._dixa_.pendingCalls || [];
      w._dixa_.pendingCalls.push([m, a]);
    },
    addListener: function (event, listener) {
      w._dixa_.pendingAddListenerCalls = w._dixa_.pendingAddListenerCalls || [];
      w._dixa_.pendingAddListenerCalls.push([event, listener]);
    }
  };

  // Inject Dixa's actual messenger script
  s = d.createElement('script');
  s.type = 'text/javascript';
  s.setAttribute('charset', 'utf-8');
  s.async = true;
  s.src = 'https://messenger.dixa.io/bootstrap.js';
  var before = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  before.parentNode.insertBefore(s, before);
})(window, document);

// Initialise with your token
_dixa_.invoke('init', { messengerToken: '8938aacacc754f759ad98fc78cdff90f' });


// === GTM-Safe Listener Attachment ===
(function () {
  var eventsToTrack = [
    'on-message-added',
    'on-conversation-started',
    'on-conversation-ended',
    'on-widget-open-changed'
  ];

  // Rename certain event types for GTM/GA4 cleanliness
  var eventNameMap = {
    'on-conversation-started': 'conversion_started',
    'on-conversation-ended': 'conversion_ended'
  };

  var attached = {}; // Prevent duplicate attachments

  function makeCallback(eventName) {
    return function (e) {
      var remappedName = eventNameMap[eventName] || eventName;

      var senderRole = e && e.content && e.content.senderRole;
      var text = e && e.content && e.content.text;
      var ts = e && e.timestamp;

      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push({
        event: 'dixa_event',
        dixa_event_type: remappedName,
        dixa_sender: senderRole || '',
        dixa_message: text || '',
        dixa_timestamp: ts || ''
      });

      console.log(' Dixa event pushed:', {
        original: eventName,
        mapped: remappedName,
        sender: senderRole,
        message: text
      });
    };
  }

  function attachListeners(dixaObj) {
    for (var i = 0; i < eventsToTrack.length; i++) {
      var eventName = eventsToTrack[i];
      if (!attached[eventName]) {
        dixaObj.addListener(eventName, makeCallback(eventName));
        attached[eventName] = true;
        console.log(' Listener attached:', eventName);
      }
    }
  }

  // Attach to stub or real immediately
  if (window._dixa_ && typeof window._dixa_.addListener === 'function') {
    attachListeners(window._dixa_);
  }

  // Attach again only after real Dixa loads (avoid duplicates)
  var interval = setInterval(function () {
    if (
      window._dixa_ &&
      typeof window._dixa_.addListener === 'function' &&
      typeof window._dixa_.api === 'object'
    ) {
      attachListeners(window._dixa_);
      clearInterval(interval);
    }
  }, 300);
})();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

  window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];
  
  function ConvertProductsForSqueezely(x){
    var y = [];
    x.forEach(function(element) {
      y.push({
        "id":element.optionSKU
      });
    });
    return y;
  }
  
  var model = {{Squeezely - Ecommerce}};

  window._sqzl.push({
    "event" : "AddToCart",
    "products" : ConvertProductsForSqueezely(model.add.products)
  });

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

  window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];
  
  function ConvertProductsForSqueezely(x){
    var y = [];
    x.forEach(function(element) {
      y.push({
        "id":element.SKU,
        "language" : "en-GB"
      });
    });
    return y;
  }
  
  var model = {{Squeezely - Ecommerce}};

  window._sqzl.push({
    "event" : "InitiateCheckout",
    "products" : ConvertProductsForSqueezely(model.checkout.products)
  });

</script>

</script>

parameter.value:
<script>

  var myArray = {{JS - Marketing Blocks - Select Promotion}};
  var cookieName = 'select_promo';
  var cookieValue = JSON.stringify(myArray); // Convert array to JSON string
  var hoursToExpire = 2; // Set expiration to 2 hours
  var expiryDate = new Date();
  expiryDate.setTime(expiryDate.getTime() + (hoursToExpire * 60 * 60 * 1000)); // Convert hours to milliseconds
  var cookie = encodeURI(cookieName) + "=" + encodeURI(cookieValue) + "; expires=" + expiryDate.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
  document.cookie = cookie;

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">;
  if ({{DLV - Emarsys - Go Event Has Ran}} == 'false') {
    
	var ecom = {{DLV - Ecommerce}};
	var pagecat = {{DLV - pageCategory}};
    var runGoCommand = false;
    var viewData;
	var cartcontent = {{DLV - Checkout - ProductDetailed}};
    var searchQuery = {{DLV - findologicSearchQuery}};
		
	var ScarabQueue = ScarabQueue || [];
		
	(function(id) {
		if (document.getElementById(id)) return;
		var js = document.createElement('script'); js.id = id;
		js.src = '//cdn.scarabresearch.com/js/{{LU - Emarsys - Merchant ID}}/scarab-v2.js';
		var fs = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
		fs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fs);
		})('scarab-js-api');

   if ({{DLV - customerId}} > 0)  { //Do not add these lines if customer is not known
		if ({{DLV - customerId}} > 0)  {ScarabQueue.push( ['setCustomerId', '{{DLV - customerId}}' ] )};
	
		if ( ecom && ecom.purchase ) {
			var emarsys_purchase_command = {
			"orderId": ecom.purchase.actionField.id,
			"items": []
			}
			
			for ( var i=0; i<ecom.purchase.productsDetailed.length; i++ ) {
			emarsys_purchase_command.items.push({
				"item": ecom.purchase.productsDetailed[ i ].optionSKU,
				"quantity": ecom.purchase.productsDetailed[ i ].quantity,
				"price": ecom.purchase.productsDetailed[ i ].price,
			});
			}

			ScarabQueue.push( ['purchase', emarsys_purchase_command ] );
            runGoCommand = true;
		};
		
    };
		
  if ( pagecat && ( "undefined" != typeof pagecat ) && ( "" != pagecat ) ) {
    
    if (pagecat == 'Category') {
      pagecat = '{{DLV - pageCategoryHierarchy}}';
    } else if (pagecat == 'Product') {
      pagecat = null;
      viewData = 'g/{{DLV - MPN}}';
    } else {
      pagecat = null;
    }
    
  };

  if (cartcontent) {
    // Passing on visitor's cart contents
    var emarsys_cart_command = {
      "items": []
    }

    for ( var i=0; i<cartcontent.length; i++ ) {
      emarsys_cart_command.items.push({
        "item": cartcontent[ i ].optionSKU,
        "quantity": cartcontent[ i ].quantity,
        "price": cartcontent[ i ].price,
      });
    }

    if (viewData && viewData != 'g/') ScarabQueue.push( ['view', viewData ] );  //Only to be sent for product pages
    if (pagecat) ScarabQueue.push( ['category', pagecat ] ); //Only to be sent on category browsing pages
    ScarabQueue.push( ['cart', emarsys_cart_command.items ] );
    runGoCommand = true;
  }
  
  if (searchQuery && ( "undefined" != typeof searchQuery ) && ( "" != searchQuery ) ) {
    console.log('Emarsys Search Fired: ' + searchQuery);
    ScarabQueue.push( ['searchTerm', searchQuery] );
  }

  //Push the users country as a custom tag
  ScarabQueue.push( ['tag', 'UserData', {countryCode: '{{JS - Global-E Country-Code-ISO}}'}] );
    
  if (runGoCommand) {
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.dataLayer.push({
      'DLV - Emarsys - Go Event Has Ran': true
    });
    ScarabQueue.push( ['go'] );
  }
  }
</script>

<!-- load BV loader -->

<!--load Transaction event and parameters-->
<script type="text/javascript">
  
var bvPurchaseItems = [];
var ProductsDetails = {{DLV - Purchase - ProductDetailed}};

for (var i = 0; i < ProductsDetails.length; i++) {
  var bvPurchaseItem = {'sku':ProductsDetails[i].optionSKU, 'name':ProductsDetails[i].name, 'price':ProductsDetails[i].priceNet.toFixed(2), 'quantity':ProductsDetails[i].quantity};
  bvPurchaseItems.push(bvPurchaseItem);
};
  
var bvOrderTotal = {{DLV - Purchase - transactionProductsTotal}};
  
window.bvCallback = function (BV) {
  BV.pixel.trackTransaction({
    "orderId" : "{{DLV - Purchase - Transaction ID}}",
    "currency" : "{{DLV - Currency Code}}",
    "total" : bvOrderTotal.toFixed(2),
    "items" : bvPurchaseItems,
    "email" : "{{DLV - Customer Email}}",
    "locale" : "{{LU - Bazaarvoice - Locale}}",
    "nickname" : "{{DLV - Customer Firstname}}"
  });
};
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	(function(clientId) {
		if(window["__adal_disable_" + clientId]) { return; }
		(function(windowAlias, documentAlias, trackerName) {
			if (!windowAlias[trackerName]) {
				windowAlias.GlobalAdalyserNamespace = windowAlias.GlobalAdalyserNamespace
						|| [];
				windowAlias.GlobalAdalyserNamespace.push(trackerName);
				windowAlias[trackerName] = function() {
					(windowAlias[trackerName].q = windowAlias[trackerName].q || []).push(arguments)
				};
				windowAlias[trackerName].q = windowAlias[trackerName].q || [];
				var nel = documentAlias.createElement("script"),
					fel = documentAlias.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
				nel.async = 1;
				nel.src = "//c5.adalyser.com/adalyser.js?cid=" + clientId;
				fel.parentNode.insertBefore(nel, fel)
			}
		}(window, document, "adalyserTracker"));
		window.adalyserTracker("create", {
			campaignCookieTimeout: 15552000,
			conversionCookieTimeout: 604800,
			clientId: clientId,
			trafficSourceInternalReferrers: [
				"^(.*\\.)?pourmoi.*$"
			]
		});
		window.adalyserTracker("trackSession", "lce1");
	})("pourmoi");
</script>

customTemplate.name: Facebook Pixel
Adsmurai Facebook, TikTok, Pinterest, Snapchat Pixel & Conversions API (CAPI)
CryptoMe
customTemplate.templateData:
___TERMS_OF_SERVICE___

By creating or modifying this file you agree to Google Tag Manager's Community
Template Gallery Developer Terms of Service available at
https://developers.google.com/tag-manager/gallery-tos (or such other URL as
Google may provide), as modified from time to time.


___INFO___

{
  "type": "TAG",
  "id": "cvt_temp_public_id",
  "version": 1.1,
  "securityGroups": [],
  "displayName": "CryptoMe",
  "categories": [
    "UTILITY",
    "TAG_MANAGEMENT",
    "PERSONALIZATION"
  ],
  "brand": {
    "id": "github.com_120feet",
    "displayName": "120feet",
    "thumbnail": "data:image/jpeg;base64,\u003d"
  },
  "description": "Create a custom event that passes an encrypted (SHA-256) value together with any other data points you need. \nEasily create a user id and more.\n\n120Feet | Digital Analytics Consultants | 120feet.com",
  "containerContexts": [
    "WEB"
  ]
}


___TEMPLATE_PARAMETERS___

[
  {
    "type": "TEXT",
    "name": "event",
    "displayName": "Event",
    "simpleValueType": true,
    "help": "The name for your custom event",
    "valueValidators": [
      {
        "type": "NON_EMPTY"
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "type": "TEXT",
    "name": "to_hash",
    "displayName": "To Encrypt",
    "simpleValueType": true,
    "help": "The value you want to encrypt",
    "valueValidators": [
      {
        "type": "NON_EMPTY"
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "type": "CHECKBOX",
    "name": "use_add",
    "checkboxText": "Additional Properties",
    "simpleValueType": true,
    "help": "Enable to pass additional key value pairs"
  },
  {
    "type": "SIMPLE_TABLE",
    "name": "add_fields",
    "displayName": "Additional Properties",
    "simpleTableColumns": [
      {
        "defaultValue": "",
        "displayName": "key",
        "name": "key",
        "type": "TEXT"
      },
      {
        "defaultValue": "",
        "displayName": "value",
        "name": "value",
        "type": "TEXT"
      }
    ],
    "enablingConditions": [
      {
        "paramName": "use_add",
        "paramValue": true,
        "type": "EQUALS"
      }
    ],
    "help": "Enter the key value pairs for any other data points you want to pass in the event",
    "valueValidators": [
      {
        "type": "NON_EMPTY"
      }
    ]
  }
]


___SANDBOXED_JS_FOR_WEB_TEMPLATE___

//APIs
const log = require('logToConsole');
const check = require('queryPermission');
const create = require('createQueue');
const hash = require('sha256');
const map = require('makeTableMap');

// create the function for the dataLayer push
const push = create('dataLayer');
// a function to merge all the object key value pairs
const merge = function(){ 
  const obj = {},
 	     l = arguments.length;
  let i = 0,
      key;
  for (; i < l; i++){
    for (key in arguments[i]) {
      obj[key] = arguments[i][key];
    }
  }
  return obj;
};

const event = {'event': data.event};
var other = [];
if(data.add_fields){
  other = map(data.add_fields, 'key', 'value');
}
else {
  other = [];
  }

//success/failure const

const onSuccess = () =>{
  data.gtmOnSuccess();
};

const onFailure = () => {
  data.gtmOnFailure();
};
  

//Now let's hash

hash(data.to_hash, (digest) => {
  const h = {'hash': digest};
  const dlayer = merge(event, h, other);
  if (check('access_globals', 'readwrite', 'dataLayer')) {
    push(dlayer);
    onSuccess();
  }},() =>{onFailure();},{outputEncoding: 'hex'});

___SANDBOXED_JS_FOR_WEB_TEMPLATE___

const injectScript = require("injectScript");
const queryPermission = require("queryPermission");
const setDefaultConsentState = require("setDefaultConsentState");
const encodeUri = require("encodeUri");
const gtagSet = require("gtagSet");
const getCookieValues = require("getCookieValues");
const updateConsentState = require("updateConsentState");

let setDefaultSetting = true;
const regionSettings = data.regionSettings || [];
const waitForTime = data.waitForTime;

function getConsentStateForCategory(categoryConsent) {
  return categoryConsent === "yes" ? "granted" : "denied";
}

function setConsentInitStates(consentData) {
  if (waitForTime > 0) consentData.wait_for_update = waitForTime;
  setDefaultConsentState(consentData);
}

gtagSet({
  ads_data_redaction: !!data.adsRedaction,
  url_passthrough: !!data.urlPassThrough,
  "developer_id.dY2Q2ZW": true,
});

for (let index = 0; index < regionSettings.length; index++) {
  const regionSetting = regionSettings[index];
  const consentRegionData = {
    ad_storage: regionSetting.advertisement,
    analytics_storage: regionSetting.analytics,
    functionality_storage: regionSetting.functional,
    personalization_storage: regionSetting.functional,
    security_storage: regionSetting.security,
    ad_user_data: regionSetting.adUserData,
    ad_personalization: regionSetting.adPersonal
  };
  const regionsToSetFor = regionSetting.regions
    .split(",")
    .map((region) => region.trim())
    .filter((region) => region);
  if (regionsToSetFor.length > 0 && regionsToSetFor[0].toLowerCase() !== "all")
    consentRegionData.region = regionsToSetFor;
  else setDefaultSetting = false;
  setConsentInitStates(consentRegionData);
}

if (setDefaultSetting) {
  setConsentInitStates({
    ad_storage: "denied",
    analytics_storage: "denied",
    functionality_storage: "denied",
    personalization_storage: "denied",
    security_storage: "granted",
    ad_user_data: "denied",
    ad_personalization: "denied"
  });
}

const consentString = getCookieValues("cookieyes-consent", false)[0];
if (consentString && typeof consentString === "string") {
  const cookieObj = consentString.split(",").reduce(function (acc, curr) {
    const cookieValue = curr.trim().split(":");
    acc[cookieValue[0]] = getConsentStateForCategory(cookieValue[1]);
    return acc;
  }, {});

  updateConsentState({
    ad_storage: cookieObj.advertisement,
    analytics_storage: cookieObj.analytics,
    functionality_storage: cookieObj.functional,
    personalization_storage: cookieObj.functional,
    security_storage: cookieObj.necessary,
    ad_user_data: cookieObj.advertisement,
    ad_personalization: cookieObj.advertisement,
  });
}

let scriptURL =
  "https://cdn-cookieyes.com/client_data/" +
  encodeUri(data.websiteKey + "/script.js");
if (!queryPermission("inject_script", scriptURL)) return data.gtmOnFailure();
injectScript(scriptURL, data.gtmOnSuccess, data.gtmOnFailure);
